text:
I love this.

HubSpot gives us easy container control with dnd sections and theme settings, so I don't see frequent need in HubSpot for this approach, but next time I build a website not on HubSpot I'll probably try this!

The breakout concept makes a lot of sense with designs I see

I was actually thinking the exact same thing about containers and HubSpot because we don't often see raw HTML without some sort of wrapper in HubSpot. But you're right if you're building in WordPress or something like that this is probably a really good tool
I take full credit for this :rolling_on_the_floor_laughing:
